name: Press SPACE (jasontomlee, JustFredrik, Roland M, failpositive, BOON)
name_original: Press SPACE (jasontomlee, JustFredrik, Roland M, failpositive, BOON)
description:
GMTK JAM 2020 
Theme: Out of Control  "Press Space" is a game made for GMTK 2020 in which you have to control various aspects of your ship (and social life) by pressing or holding down certain keys on your keyboard. The theme is taken literally, in that you run out of buttons to press. Your goal: don't die, keep everything in tip top shape. Drift through space . .

                                    . . . by managing controls that . .

   . . . get out of . . . control . .

Can YOU PRESS?   - O2  - Fuel   - Engine  - Sensors   - Shields  CREW  Sahand "Cakeprediction" - Programming  Roland "roliDev" Munguia   - Programming Oscar "BOONDev" Gonzalez - Programming & UI
 Jason "JasonTomLee" Lee  - Animation & VFX Fredrik "JustFredrik" Svanholm - Art Failpositive - Music & Sound (Soundtrack)
